sections.title: Transforming technology within the Department of Defense

sections.mdMain:
**We're on a mission.**

The Defense Digital Service (DDS) is a SWAT team of nerds established by the Secretary of Defense to provide the best in modern technology to bolster national defense. We are designers, product managers, engineers, and data scientists from industry and government who advance critical DoD initiatives.
sections.mdCallout: **We focus on high-impact projects that advance the Department of Defense's most important initiatives.**

icons.title: Who We Are
icons.details: We are a SWAT team of nerds that provides the best in modern technical knowledge to bolster national defense.

icons.title: What We Do
icons.details: We focus on high-impact projects that advance the DoD's most important initiatives that are critical to the well-being of service members, civilians, and core operations of the Department.

icons.title: Media
icons.details: Check out DDS in the news, our latest announcements, our blog, and connect with us on Twitter and LinkedIn.

sections.mdMain:
**We're focused on hiring the best to serve the best.**

Interested in proving hoodies, hackers, and nerds have an important role to play in furthering national defense missions?
sections.mdCallout: **Doing work that matters by focusing our time and energy on high-priority undertakings.**
